content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0.0-2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of:
- 2 stone furnaces working on iron ore production
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel and 22 iron ore
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel and 22 iron ore

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace working on copper ore production
- Contains coal fuel and 22 copper ore

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Pipe network carrying water to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe network carrying steam

### Research Facility (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position not directly specified but connected to power)
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

### Power Distribution
Electric pole network connecting power generation to assembling machines and other electrical entities

ERROR TIPS

### Assembling Machine Resource Management
- The assembling machine is frequently showing ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE status
- Ensure consistent supply of both iron plates and copper cables to prevent production interruptions

### Fuel Management
- Multiple instances of needing to fix fuel levels in boilers and burner inserters
- Implement more proactive fuel monitoring and replenishment system
- Consider keeping higher coal reserves in burner devices to prevent frequent refueling

### Resource Flow
- Monitor and balance the production rates of iron plates, copper plates and copper cables
- Ensure proper ratio between raw material processing and assembly operations
